statement: Write a program that gets a line of space-separated integers and outputs the most common number.
Write a program that prints every perfect square between 13 and 730. Print one number per line.
Write a program that prints every even integer between 2 and 100 inclusive. Every integer should be in its own line and there should be an empty line in the end.
Write a program that given a list of space-separated integers in a single line, prints out a line with the same numbers, but sorted.
